name: VR Battle of Battleship
summary:
Basic Operation:
You can start the battle by firing the main guns of the battleship.
The following modern weapons are added to increase the tension of the game:
    Your battleship has CIWS Beam for defense
    Enemy battleship has Anti-ship missiles

The Physical Law Modification:
To realize the short-time and amazing spectacle battle of huge battleships, some of the physical laws in this Real-Time Simulation World are carefully modified.

Conclusion:
We believe that the amazing spectacle battle of the...
